entity.name: CircuitVerse Community/Organisation
entity.description: The entity stewarding the CircuitVerse open-source project, which is an easy-to-use digital logic circuit simulator and educational platform. Funds are primarily used for infrastructure and miscellaneous expenses.

projects.name: CircuitVerse Platform
projects.description: A free, open-source platform which allows users to construct and simulate digital logic circuits online, along with an Interactive Book for learning digital logic design.

channels.description: Funding is managed through Open Source Collective 501(c)(3) Fiscal Host.
